ItemType.name: escape capsule
ItemType.StaticData: <00182001_Donation> ; attd rel text (same as sung coffin) '(Nil -1 100 "We will take care of these lost children and teach them the way of Domina. Trust your fate to Domina.") </00182001_Donation>

Events.Eject: ; Ejects the capsule (block (theObj) (setq theObj (sysCreateStation &stEscapeCapsule; gSource)) (objSetVel theObj (sysVectorPolarVelocity (random 0 359) 20)) (objAddItem theObj (itmSetData gItem 'ejected True)) (objRemoveItem gSource gItem) )
Events.OnObjDestroyed:
(switch (itmGetData gItem 'ejected) Nil
(find '('disintegration 'shatter 'enteredStargate) aDestroyReason) Nil
(!= gSource aObjDestroyed) Nil
; Lots of pods causes problems! ;(for i 1 (itmGetCount gItem) (block ( (angle (random 0 359)) ; Create pod short distance from source object. Needs to be outside wreck or the two ; will get stuck together. Explosion should be sufficient to give the pod initial velocity (pos (sysVectorPolarOffset gSource angle 2)) theObj ) ; Ship version does not work as well as the station one ; (setq theObj (sysCreateShip &scEscapeCapsule; pos &svIndependentTrader;)) ; (shpOrder theObj 'hold)
(setq theObj (sysCreateStation &stEscapeCapsule; pos)) (objSetVel theObj (sysVectorPolarVelocity angle 20)) ; Pods only eject once (objAddItem theObj (itmSetData gItem 'ejected True)) (if aWreckObj (objRemoveItem aWreckObj gItem)) )
)

Main.OnScreenInit: ; If there is not exactly one item here then something has gone wrong (if (or (!= 1 (count (objGetItems gSource "*"))) (!= 1 (itmGetCount (@ (objGetItems gSource "*") 0)))) (scrShowScreen gScreen &dsRPGLoot; { forceUndock: 'forceUndock }) )

Default.desc: You find an escape capsule floating in space.

ItemType.name: EM Thumper
ItemType.description: The EM Thumper was one of the first mining pods developed. Although Galactic Construction failed to negotiate a contract with the IMU, some pilots still prefer the thumper due to the secondary uses of its thermonuclear charge.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block (thumperObj) (setq thumperObj (sysCreateShip &scMiningThumper; (objGetPos gSource) &svFriendlyAuton;)) (objSetVel thumperObj (objGetVel gSource)) (objSetData thumperObj 'ownerID (objGetID gSource)) (shpOrder thumperObj 'wait)
; Identify and consume the thumper (itmSetKnown gItem) (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

Events.OnDamageAbandoned:
(switch ; If not an asteroid, then nothing to do (not (objHasAttribute gSource "asteroid")) Nil
; If there is no ore here, nothing to do (not (objGetItems gSource "t +ore;")) Nil
; If we already have this overlay, then nothing to do (filter (objGetOverlays gSource) theOverlay (= (objGetOverlayType gSource theOverlay) &ovThumperOre;) ) Nil
; Otherwise, create an overlay (block (depositID) (objAddOverlay gSource &ovThumperOre;) (if (setq depositID (objGetData gSource 'oreDeposit)) (miningNotifyOnOreDepositFound (objGetObjByID depositID) aOrderGiver) ) ; Return Nil to indicate that default damage applies Nil ) )
